attributes.action: consider legislation to impose a life ban from Parliament on any MP proved to have fraudulently claimed expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the overwhelming evidence that there is an epidemic of fraudulent expense claims amongst MPs. It is the public's perception that MP's consider themselves above the law. This petition seeks to convey the public disgust and anger at the ability of MPs to abuse the expense claim system, stay in public office and carry on making moral judgements in the interest of the citizens' of the UK.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
